channel.desc: Say hello to Homeworx by Harry Slatkin, a luxury home fragrance range currently only available here at QVC. Discover stunning candles, diffusers and wax melts to fill your home with gorgeous scent.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Tools & Accessories
channel.desc: The beauty tools you use are as important as your products, so enjoy professional-standard implements and accessories, from lash curlers to make-up bags and tweezers to brushes.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Gift Box
channel.desc: Whether you're treating yourself or a special someone to a piece from our Jewellery Gift Box, you'll find a host of exquisite pieces to choose from. Oh, go on - you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Snuggle up with Cozee Loungewear
channel.desc: Snuggle up at home during the chilly winter months with soft, warm loungewear from Cozee Home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Join Jackie Kabler as she chats to our panel of experts and founders about the menopause, helping you navigate midlife on your terms. From inspiring stories to game-changing products, tune in today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Ideas with Tili
channel.desc: Discover some fabulous beauty finds in this show with Tili, offering you everything from gorgeous skincare essentials to cult make-up favourites. Go on, treat yourself or someone you love.

channel.desc: Find the perfect gift with fashion accessories by some of our most sought-after brands. From chic purses and wallets to cosy pyjamas and slippers, there's something for everyone.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Peony Flowers New Collection
channel.desc: Discover exquisite faux flower arrangements with Peony's new collection, crafted on the Ruckley Estate. Elevate your home with Chelsea-inspired designs, exclusive to QVC.

channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Frank Usher
channel.desc: Discover elegant clothing and accessories from Frank Usher. Designed for the modern woman, these beautiful designs will add a touch of sparkle and glamour to your wardrobe with comfort in mind.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Christmas Sparkle & Shine Shop
channel.desc: Brighten up your home with the Christmas Sparkle & Shine Shop! Discover home accessories and seasonal decor to add that festive flair to every corner of your space.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: JM Home by Julien Macdonald
channel.desc: Transform your home for the holidays with JM Home by Julien Macdonald Christmas Edition. Discover glamorous d?cor and festive touches to make your space sparkle this season.

channel.title: Ben De Lisi Autumn Collection
channel.desc: Refresh your wardrobe with the Ben de Lisi Autumn Collection. Discover elegant designs, rich textures and versatile pieces perfect for the season, all crafted with Ben's signature style and flair.

channel.title: Festive Finds Under ?40
channel.desc: Dive into Festive Finds Under ?40! Explore a range of holiday treasures, perfect for making Christmas extra special without breaking the bank.

channel.desc: Get a sneak peak at the upcoming Fashion Day. This is your chance to find out more about the new trends we'll be presenting, and to get your hands on some of this season's must-haves.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Best Beauty Buys with Nails...
channel.desc: Nail your at-home manicure with a little help from Nails Inc and other specially-selected beauty buys right here at QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Festive Food
channel.desc: Set your Christmas table with a mouth-watering festive feast in this show, boasting a bounty of delicious wintery fare to tuck into. From special savouries to sweet treats, find it here.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hotel Chocolat
channel.desc: Join us for an utterly delicious show as Hotel Chocolat share their tempting collections and luxurious gift ideas, featuring exquisite chocolate made from rich Saint Lucian cacao.[(96057)]
